net.canarymod.commandsys

Annotation Type Command


  • @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
 @Target(value=METHOD)
public @interface Command
    Used to annotate CommandListener methods and describe how a command should be handled within the CommandManager CanaryCommand
    Author:
    Willem Mulder, Chris (damagefilter)

    • Required Element Summary

      Required Elements 
      Modifier and Type Required Element and Description
      java.lang.String[] aliases
      The command names
      java.lang.String description
      What does this command do? This will be displayed in a help context.
      java.lang.String[] permissions
      A list of permissions to use this command.
      java.lang.String toolTip
      The tip to display when command parsing failed.

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      java.lang.String helpLookup
      Explicitly define a name with which the command will be registered at the help system.
      int max
      The max amounts of parameters.
      int min
      Min amount of parameters
      java.lang.String parent
      The parent command, for creating sub-command structures
      java.lang.String[] searchTerms
      Specifies specific terms for looking up this command in help search
      int version
      The version of the command system to use.

    • Element Detail

      • aliases

        public abstract java.lang.String[] aliases
        The command names
        Returns:
        string array of aliases

      • permissions

        public abstract java.lang.String[] permissions
        A list of permissions to use this command. If you specify more than one, only one of them is needed to execute the command
        Returns:
        string array of permissions

      • description

        public abstract java.lang.String description
        What does this command do? This will be displayed in a help context. Note: This string will be pushed through the translator that is attached to this command. If it finds a respective translation, it will output that instead
        Returns:
        description string

      • toolTip

        public abstract java.lang.String toolTip
        The tip to display when command parsing failed. This may also be displayed when help for this command was specifically requested
        Returns:
        the tool tip

      • parent

        public abstract java.lang.String parent
        The parent command, for creating sub-command structures
        Returns:
        parent command
        Default:
        ""

      • helpLookup

        public abstract java.lang.String helpLookup
        Explicitly define a name with which the command will be registered at the help system. If this is empty (default), all aliases will be registered. Otherwise only this name will be registered.
        Use it for registering sub-command helps to avoid name conflicts
        Returns:
        help lookup string
        Default:
        ""

      • searchTerms

        public abstract java.lang.String[] searchTerms
        Specifies specific terms for looking up this command in help search
        Returns:
        string array of search terms
        Default:
        " "

      • min

        public abstract int min
        Min amount of parameters
        Returns:
        minimum parameters
        Default:
        0

      • max

        public abstract int max
        The max amounts of parameters. -1 for infinite amount
        Returns:
        maximum parameters
        Default:
        -1

      • version

        public abstract int version
        The version of the command system to use. Version 1 passes the command name with the arguments, where as Version 2 adjusts the arguments to remove command name.

        NOTE: Available versions are '1' and '2'.

        Returns:
        version of the command system
        Default:
        1
